name: UNDRESS!
description:
UNDRESS! - is an exciting game in which the player as the protagonist must choose his mate from five potential partners. He uses a dating app and receives five date invitations.

The player has to show his instinct and determine which of the five girls he wants to spend a date with. Each girl has her own unique personality traits and interests

After choosing his partner, the player goes on a date. At the end of the date there is a mini-game in which the player must find two identical pairs of underwear. For the guessed pair, the player can remove any piece of clothing from the girl. And when the mini-game ends there is a choice of three sexy animated scenes (͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Features:

  • Сute and sexy 5 different girls.
  • 12 HD artworks, with animations and voiced
  • Relaxing and atmosphere music
  • Picture gallery

Function keys(Better not to use them):

  • Keyboard N: Complete level
